name: simple routing
short_description:
Designed to be a simple light weight and easily accessible way of mapping pathing information to a unlimited number of objects. The template is also designed to keep a minimum profile when idle, and efficient as possible means of updating a network.

Not limited to, but primarily envisioned to give game developers with limited knowledge of  higher-grade routing protocols a out of the box means for pathing.
summary: Simplistic templace header for c++ based pathing or routing.
